text: Hi, guys.
Summer vacation is truly

one of the best times
of the year.
But for me and my family,
nothing is as cool

as our Adventures By
Disney Vacation

to Yellowstone
and Grand Teton National Parks
through Wyoming.
( music playing )

I'm here with my mom,
my dad, my older sister,

my little sister,
and my little brother.

We have other families
coming with us,

so we have this
big extended family

and we're all going on
this trip together.

We just got our
Wyoming welcome pins!
Sanabias aren't huge cowboys.
We're used to our city life,

so we're very excited
to get outdoors

- and try all-new things.
- Welcome to Wyoming, everybody!

- Yeah!
- Doug is our adventure guide,
and he is so awesome.
He just makes things so easy,
and when we need something,
he's already got it done.
There's a very important word
that we use here in Wyoming

that expresses
enthusiasm and joy.

Do you know what
that word might be?

- Yee-ha!
- Yee-- there it is!
We weren't sure what to expect.
It was something new for us.

But Adventures By Disney
has taken care of everything

from A to Z, and so far
it has been amazing.

From here,
we're going to head up north

and start to enjoy
some national parks.

Adventures By Disney is
a hassle-free family vacation.

You get to go to wonderful
destinations around the world,

participate in some
amazing activities,

and all with the experience
of having adventure guides

take of everything
for you along the way.

Are you guys
excited to be here?

- Yee-ha!
- All right!

Welcome to

they're larger than life.

Yellowstone, yee-ha!

My family and I woke up early
and decided to go out
and watch Old Faithful erupt.
Old Faithful is this geyser

that's been around
for a very long time,

and the reason that
it's called Old Faithful

is because it erupts
every 90 minutes,
almost to the minute.

It's not what I expected.
It looks so cool.
It looks really cool.
We were a little bit silent.
We were just taking it in
and enjoying the moment.
We went to these hot springs,

he gave us these guns that
measured the temperature.

I've learned that
they're not geysers,

they're hot springs,

to go take a bath in.

It's like a little
mini hot tub!

- Oh, wow. Look at that.
- Look at that!

It's just been so seamless

It's been magical.

We're about five miles

We're staying at

You get a genuine
western experience here.

It was hungry the whole time.

It wanted to stop and eat

But I also learned

It was like teamwork,

anything like that.
Good job, 101.

I was a little apprehensive

I think I'm going to go

She did great.
She did great.
It was so beautiful out there,

and the water
is nice and calm.

Being with my family

We're going to beat you guys!

You can't describe it.
It's something that you'd

The beauty,

It's something

With Adventures By Disney,

I have had so many amazing

I've seen two national parks.

Seeing my family

We've become so adventurous

Doug: I've loved getting
to know the Sanabia family.

It's wonderful seeing a family

It has been
absolutely incredible.

Adventures By Disney

We've been able

It's been beyond

Just not having

it's been the best
family vacation we've ever had.

I would definitely give
